name: Gallery Made Easy
author: Earl Evan Amante

sections.description: Instantly create responsive image galleries within a simple and customizable interface. Just upload, add, organise and publish.
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload gallery-made-easy/ directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. For best experience, make sure you’ve installed a thumbnail regeneration plugin
  4. Go to Gallery
  5. Create a gallery
  6. Add it to your page or post using the shortcode or the visible gallery button in the editor
sections.faq:
How to use the contact manager

This is a straight forward plugin. And the steps below will summarize what you will do with it:

  • Go to Gallery
  • Create a gallery
  • Add the gallery to your page or post using the shortcode or the visible gallery button in the editor
